item.huanle.sun_god_sword.desc: Right-click to unleash the power of the sun
item.huanle.sun_god_sword.desc2: Deal 5 damage, range is 8x8 blocks, and burn entities
enchantment.huanle.lightning_strike.desc: Strikes lightning when attacking entities, higher levels summon more lightning bolts. Can be applied to swords, tridents and axes
advancements.huanle.ender_sword.title: Ender Sword
advancements.huanle.sun_god_sword.title: Sun God Sword
